heading: This Afternoon
text: Mostly cloudy. Chance of showers in the southeast, scattered and diminishing elsewhere, except likely early in the northeast. Highs from the mid 60s to around 70, except low to mid 70s southeast, and in the St. Lawrence Valley. Winds variable at around 5 mph, except northeast 5 to 10 mph in the St. Lawrence Valley.

heading: Tonight
text: Mostly cloudy. Showers becoming likely far south, otherwise scattered and diminishing. Lows from the mid 50s to around 60. Winds becoming light and variable.

heading: Wednesday
text: Mostly cloudy, except mostly to partly cloudy far north. Chance of showers along and south of Route 4, slight chance to the north. Highs from the upper 60s to mid 70s. Winds becoming north to northeast 5 to 10 mph.
